document.title: CTE Model Curriculum Standards: Marketing, Sales, and Service

E733AA64E0CF4342B992F7C8BEBAA762.description: Understand policies and laws regarding harassment, nondiscrimination, and safety.

9306F27A53D74D08AE5C3334B9735713.description: Understand the relationship between supply and demand and pricing and production.

B7EBF3C8F6E44CE1BEF2820815115435.description: Compare and contrast leadership styles and characteristics.

362952976F1D40D491557FF42F01E8F7.description: Evaluate leadership styles and management functions for the small business.

465FE1DCCCB2454EA60BD292F304C519.description: Analyze strengths and weaknesses of self in terms of entrepreneurial success.

1E7F1936BFBD4C1799DD234A4B869A39.description: Define and identify the following entrepreneurial characteristics: adaptability, competitiveness, confidence, discipline, perseverance, vision and risk taking.

3A816BE2D3E6477CB2D56AEFEB7BA5FF.description: Define the role the entrepreneur plays in the free-enterprise system.

comments: Develop knowledge and skills common to entrepreneurs and entrepreneurship, including the human characteristics vital for entrepreneurial thinking in a twenty-first-century global world. Entrepreneurial thinking may be applied to all industry sectors. The performance indicators provide business knowledge and skills required for entrepreneurs, as well as intangible skills and knowledge such as creativity and innovation skills.

D934D707937D478C99B89624C67A0D4D.description: Research consumers' needs and wants to identify product/service gaps and to develop, maintain, and improve, products and services.

611E07F2CD5C4FAB82D948696F347F8E.description: Track consumer spending trends, and analyze data to forecast sales, predict economic conditions, and guide business activities.

AB856D306C4049FDBBD0DFD710A1516E.description: Analyze and use data to identify potential customers and locations for business expansion.

0C6B406F2C8F4DB680D8718E7821E242.description: Explain the main characteristics of a successful salesperson including; listening, verbal and written communication skills, product knowledge, customer connection, trust worthiness, and power of persuasion.

3EE79E81D88F435AA3036B99298EE33E.description: Understand the nature and scope of the functions associated with personal and business sales strategies, product knowledge, support activities, and management of selling techniques.

949FDC04FBB44F8E9D254B9EF7249AE4.description: Respond thoughtfully to diverse perspectives; synthesize comments, claims, and evidence made on all sides of an issue.

82A591B2B4074E7E9BD0F0682C8E4D5E.description: Explain the importance of customer service and explain communication techniques.

86928A5B483448D1B871F0F5E46A2359.description: Differentiate between each stage of the customer buying process.

8E0294DEDF414C33962529AD0E27605E.description: Understand legal aspects pertaining to advertising and pricing.

E173F01799ED48FBBFF657D98D8FE198.description: Analyze and evaluate legal, moral, and ethical issues affecting selling and sales management.

comments: Develop knowledge and skills in the theory and practice of sales designed to provide a professional foundation to those involved in personal selling careers, including the fundamentals of personal selling with an emphasis on customer behavior, persuasive presentation of ideas, products and services, and developing sales goals.

3F4AC08C62F940CBB44AFAF36DC658AE.description: Explain the concept of economic resources.

4ACA98312DAF49E1B174062261634EA5.description: Use digital and graphic design in creation of advertising.

79C11E958581435FA36A48178BE374A5.description: Assess the importance of leadership and management in the multicultural environment.

0AE2BC96FCE44B329B8BCD399D62AB7D.description: Examine management styles and the role of management in marketing.

2ABE006ED29642FD92C031863FB07A4E.description: Explore ways technology impacts business competitiveness.

48097A96B32F423896D151C7A26BA73A.description: Explain the role of business and society.

BC9C30E3C40D4FC3B26B1B52746F6737.description: Demonstrate an understanding of business fundamentals, uses and application of technologies, communications, and basic management functions.

comments: Using both creative and systems processes, develop marketing concepts and principles and their practical application in marketing and management. Subject matter includes market research, economics, marketing budgets, creative development and design, and marketing foundations/ functions with emphasis on public relations, advertising, branding, promotion, product/service management, pricing and distribution. Specialized programs of study in this field may include sports marketing, hospitality marketing, advertising or market research.

B02AB4ABFCA042E8A5A3C57E9C0B3EA1.description: Create a portfolio, or similar collection of work, that offers evidence through assessment and evaluation of skills and knowledge competency as contained in the anchor standards, pathway standards, and performance indicators.

745AF778B5DB413EBA648BD41F9B38D8.description: Employ entrepreneurial practices and behaviors appropriate to Marketing, Sales, and Services sector opportunities.

3740E2C1203145C3A8D617653C51AB6A.description: Demonstrate entrepreneurship skills and knowledge of self-employment options and innovative ventures.

1954E481271548A0A4FA847E1B968D2A.description: Demonstrate proficiency in a career technical pathway that leads to certification, licensure, and/or continued learning at the postsecondary level.

C486E313610149629E23973BDC18349B.description: Utilize work-based/workplace learning experiences to demonstrate and expand upon knowledge and skills gained during classroom instruction and laboratory practices specific to the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector program of study.

comments: Demonstrate and apply the knowledge and skills contained in the Marketing, Sales, and Services anchor standards, pathway standards, and performance indicators in classroom, laboratory and workplace settings, and through the DECA career technical student organization.

4001F7B3B2BE47A0B1B440C9E747F7FD.description: Communicate the economic principles and concepts fundamental to business operations and the importance of marketing in a global economy. (Economics)

7D4D588E277246679FE820C872CC35AA.description: Employ the financial concepts used in making marketing decisions.

E856B163AB0F44158DB63AC9AEB26279.description: Integrate the marketing information management concepts, systems, and tools needed to obtain, evaluate, and disseminate information for use in making marketing decisions.

1DF2E3C19C294878B0D20583AACC6B5C.description: Collaborate with industry experts for specific technical knowledge and skills.

87ED278CF9E046D1A53A2CB33496F53F.description: Construct projects and products specific to the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector requirements and expectations.

E1F5561CE83F47F19183CE9CAECA9904.description: Comply with the rules, regulations, and expectations of all aspects of the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector.

1EA990B2AF2A4480B066B6AEDD01CEF6.description: Interpret and explain terminology and practices specific to the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector.

comments: Apply essential technical knowledge and skills common to all pathways in the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector, following procedures when carrying out experiments or performing technical tasks.

74360BF2069947DC8C64F3E13BB564CF.description: Participate in interactive teamwork to solve real Marketing, Sales, and Services sector issues and problems.

3F1E42693D5D4E9A80D3F5DB4856B606.description: Respect individual and cultural differences and recognize the importance of diversity in the workplace.

0633F74567C84679A2572DE4398FA2AC.description: Understand that the modern world is an international community and requires an expanded global view.

5A12E1DAA59B44E8900F5A6AA4B2D8DD.description: Explain how professional associations and organizations and associated leadership development and competitive career development activities enhance academic preparation, promote career choices, and contribute to employment opportunities.

95B5CFB21CCF4A05ACB7B7C56783DBDB.description: Understand the characteristics and benefits of teamwork, leadership, and citizenship in the school, community, and workplace setting.

36B6F9D594054591B0B8BC717118EF5E.description: Identify the characteristics of successful teams, including leadership, cooperation, collaboration, and effective decision-making skills as applied in groups, teams, and career technical student organization activities.

1CD978ADBD8C4BDDB0C679C67CE3B592.description: Define leadership and identify the responsibilities, competencies, and behaviors of successful leaders.

comments: Work with peers to promote divergent and creative perspectives, effective leadership, group dynamics, team and individual decision making, benefits of workforce diversity, and conflict resolution as practiced in the DECA career technical student organization.

B58020F4A1234F6182397060C4A94E4B.description: Conform to rules and regulations regarding sharing of confidential information, as determined by Marketing, Sales, and Services sector laws and practices.

3EA936B9759C4671B7423FC58D7A6531.description: Adhere to copyright and intellectual property laws and regulations, and use and appropriately cite proprietary information.

15AC58FF43C14CCDB03011600F664F7B.description: Analyze organizational culture and practices within the workplace environment.

699A28DB87F343AF815CDD954F9A14FD.description: Explain the importance of personal integrity, confidentiality, and ethical behavior in the workplace.

35BBC93A9D3443D0905AB94ECA225553.description: Demonstrate the importance of truthfulness, honesty, and quality in the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector.

6414AA81277B4D7E9A425C2D79A683C2.description: Demonstrate ethical and legal practices consistent with Marketing, Sales, and Services sector workplace standards.

A8BAACAFD7284CE49006630286575BE9.description: Identify local, district, state, and federal regulatory agencies, entities, laws, and regulations related to the Marketing, Sales, and Services industry sector.

F8AE4809D6E94A1DA8F421439C8C2DB0.description: Access, analyze, and implement quality assurance standards of practice.

comments: Practice professional, ethical, and legal behavior, responding thoughtfully to diverse perspectives and resolving contradictions when possible, consistent with applicable laws, regulations, and organizational norms.

6ECD69540FB9425D97C4509BA5935486.description: Explore issues of global significance and document the impact on the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector.

2098BF2E708A4312B8C70B1AA6A9236D.description: Demonstrate the qualities and behaviors that constitute a positive and professional work demeanor, including appropriate attire for the profession.

6001E133DCCC4FB780367BF4916B93BA.description: Demonstrate knowledge and practice of responsible financial management.

38BD12CDAB324A2EB30DB257F5BE9A17.description: Apply high-quality techniques to product or presentation design and development.

8DE4A58A6264454C99218C121235DDF1.description: Practice time management and efficiency to fulfill responsibilities.

8CA4838D3A4842FDAD6625AF0FFDE05C.description: Understand the need to adapt to changing and varied roles and responsibilities.

D82438A77B3F4C17801E4C8E1278166C.description: Explain the importance of accountability and responsibility in fulfilling personal, community, and workplace roles.

2E16CF921C3D4F9580ECEBE31FA01B04.description: Recognize how financial management impacts the economy, workforce, and community.

comments: Initiate and participate in a range of collaborations demonstrating behaviors that reflect personal and professional responsibility, flexibility, and respect in the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector workplace environment and community settings.

F94C4D97698D4D1A9E8EC1794C89CA77.description: Be informed of laws/acts pertaining to the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA).

BB52BC1C55394EBD818154210AE44204.description: Maintain a safe and healthful working environment and practice risk management to ensure security and to prevent loss of property.

DA520533C6DE47D88ECA534E54FCD460.description: Demonstrate how to prevent and respond to work-related accidents or injuries; this includes demonstrating an understanding of ergonomics.

AFC130E69A694EA9858B9A03BC6926C9.description: Practice personal safety when lifting, bending, or moving equipment and supplies.

D7BE70CFB1404591A385D5A285D04BFA.description: Use health and safety practices for storing, cleaning, and maintaining tools, equipment, and supplies.

4C96693521AA4CCFA70A961B67EA4F3D.description: Interpret policies, procedures, and regulations for the workplace environment, including employer and employee responsibilities.

976B21C71F14405AA89E072C558D2D75.description: Locate and adhere to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) instructions.

comments: Demonstrate health and safety procedures, regulations, and personal health practices and determine the meaning of symbols, key terms, and domain-specific words and phrases as related to the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector workplace environment.

B0141DF503DC4F858A1F05B1DCAED2CC.description: Interpret information and draw conclusions, based on the best analysis, to make informed decisions.

F956FCAB773D41958C42FDDB6950758D.description: Use systems thinking to analyze how various components interact with each other to produce outcomes in a complex work environment.

E2552A14B8A74B5899779B45F2440967.description: Solve predictable and unpredictable work-related problems using various types of reasoning (inductive, deductive) as appropriate.

48801CABB3124BDA869739749D630E30.description: Identify and ask significant questions that clarify various points of view to solve problems.

comments: Conduct short, as well as more sustained, research to create alternative solutions to answer a question or solve a problem unique to the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector using critical and creative thinking, logical reasoning, analysis, inquiry, and problem-solving techniques.

BD98F18C70974FB3AE206E39A453479C.description: Assess the value of various information and communication technologies to interact with constituent populations as part of a search of the current literature or in relation to the information task.

2ABD0390A6E04E4BBD2211C2A9C05E30.description: Research past, present, and projected technological advances as they impact a particular pathway.

422EA1D9496441F5ADC86B47546572F7.description: Discern the quality and value of information collected using digital technologies, and recognize bias and intent of the associated sources.

9D89296D489749C5BE915AFF0ED311BE.description: Use information and communication technologies to synthesize, summarize, compare, and contrast information from multiple sources.

CD3F3B85709B479D8D58E198CCDCCC7F.description: Employ Web-based communications responsibly and effectively to explore complex systems and issues.

73A9FE36CAEE4CD5A77659BA39FF0FD3.description: Use electronic reference materials to gather information and produce products and services.

comments: Use existing and emerging technology to investigate, research, and produce products and services, including new information, as required in the Marketing, Sales, and Services sector workplace environment.

962E67924926476EA48F944DE9B72BFD.description: Develop a career plan that reflects career interests, pathways, and postsecondary options.

59DF93AD8ACC41719FAACECBEE41BE95.description: Understand how digital media are used by potential employers and postsecondary agencies to evaluate candidates.

181183C354184031A43D3EE6B93BED27.description: Recognize the importance of small business in the California and global economies.

EBBFBD11CDDD4F9889E5371153F32DBF.description: Recognize the role and function of professional organizations, industry associations, and organized labor in a productive society.

6168BC04126D4D459C95108A8258602B.description: Integrate changing employment trends, societal needs, and economic conditions into career planning.

CAF96555114C4E32835B0817C1777CBF.description: Research the scope of career opportunities available and the requirements for education, training, certification, and licensure.

68F01457E11B41DD96AC2138955A9FCF.description: Explore how information and communication technologies are used in career planning and decision making.

E8CDCF2ED2B64D678DAE35094E258A5B.description: Evaluate personal character traits such as trust, respect, and responsibility and understand the impact they can have on career success.

0F5E092A654C4609827533E14B97D6BD.description: Identify personal interests, aptitudes, information, and skills necessary for informed career decision making.

comments: Integrate multiple sources of career information from diverse formats to make informed career decisions, solve problems, and manage personal career plans.

F6AA5AE9328B4F33AE56AF816001D27A.description: Advocate and practice safe, legal, and responsible use of digital media information and communications technologies.

2CD8EAC567AE4CE496C920CF84918FD5.description: Communicate information and ideas effectively to multiple audiences using a variety of media and formats.

E6121CD3A9A440A8B8DF8EC179711BC0.description: Demonstrate elements of written and electronic communication such as accurate spelling, grammar, and format.

63E9FA9305B84F3FBC75704E25786255.description: Interpret verbal and nonverbal communications and respond appropriately.

0A2D6A039AD24498B129BDF5CA3B3906.description: Identify barriers to accurate and appropriate communication.

2CB11E5A11FF4723988E1597E22AC62F.description: Recognize the elements of communication using a senderâ€“receiver model.

comments: Acquire and accurately use Marketing, Sales, and Services sector terminology and protocols at the career and college readiness level for communicating effectively in oral, written, and multimedia formats.

Analyze and apply appropriate academic standards required for successful industry sector pathway completion leading to postsecondary education and employment. Refer to the Marketing, Sales, and Services academic alignment matrix for identification of standards.
